alert.note: Alert for Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 14 at 11:06PM EDT until August 14 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Walker County in northwestern Georgia... Southwestern Dade County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 1145 PM EDT. * At 1106 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ider, or 13 miles southwest of Trenton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cooper Heights and Rising Fawn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
